code: import axios from'axios';import{getToken}from'./auth';const API_URL=process.env.REACT_APP_API_URL||'http://localhost:3000/api';export async function getCurrentUser(){const token=getToken();if(!token)throw new Error('No autenticado');const res=await axios.get(`${API_URL}/users/me`,{headers:{Authorization:`Bearer ${token}`}});return res.data;}
